info.title: Skosmos API
info.description:
The Skosmos REST API is a read-only interface to the data stored on the vocabulary server. The URL namespace is the base URL of the Skosmos instance followed by `/rest/v1/`. 

Most methods return the data as UTF-8 encoded JSON-LD, served using the `application/json` MIME type. The data consists of a single JSON object which includes JSON-LD context information (in the `@context` field) and one or more fields which contain the actual data. Some methods (`data`) return other formats (RDF/XML, Turtle, RDF/JSON) with the appropriate MIME type.

The API supports Cross-Origin Resource Sharing by setting the Access-Control-Allow-Origin HTTP header to `"*"` for all requests.

The API supports the JSONP convention of appending a callback parameter to any URL. The returned data will then be wrapped in a JavaScript function call using the function name provided as the callback parameter value. JSONP wrapped data will be served using the `application/javascript` MIME type.

get.summary: Available vocabularies

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: a list of vocabularies on the server

get.summary: Search concepts and collections by query term

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the term to search for e.g. "cat*"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels to match, e.g. "en" or "fi"

parameters.name: labellang
parameters.description: language of labels to return, e.g. "en" or "fi"

parameters.name: vocab
parameters.description: vocabulary/vocabularies to limit search to, e.g. "yso" or "yso allars"

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: limit search to concepts of the given type(s), e.g. "skos:Concept".

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: limit search to concepts which have the given concept (specified by URI) as parent in their transitive broader hierarchy

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: limit search to concepts in the given group (specified by URI)

parameters.name: maxhits
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. If not given, maxhits will default to 100. (default settable in config.ttl)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset where to start in ther esult set, useful for paging the result. If not given, defaults to 0.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: space-separated list of extra fields to include in the results. e.g. "related" or "prefLabel" or any other skos property.

parameters.name: unique
parameters.description: boolean flag to indicate that each concept should be returned only once, instead of returning all the different ways it could match (for example both via prefLabel and altLabel).

200.description: data of the concepts matching the search term

get.summary: RDF data of the requested concept

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose data to return

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the MIME type of the serialization format, e.g. "text/turtle" or "application/rdf+xml"

200.description: the data of the requested concept

404.description: the URI did not match any known concept

get.summary: Information about the types (classes) of objects contained in all  vocabularies

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the data of the requested concept

get.summary: General information about the vocabulary

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: The Skosmos vocabulary id e.g. stw or yso

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: information about the requested vocabulary

404.description: no vocabulary could be found with the requested id

get.summary: Information about the types (classes) of objects in the vocabulary

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: type information about the requested vocabulary

404.description: no vocabulary could be found with the requested id

get.summary: Top concepts of the vocabulary

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

parameters.name: scheme
parameters.description: concept scheme whose top concepts to return. If not given, the default concept scheme of the vocabulary will be used.

200.description: type information about the requested vocabulary

404.description: no vocabulary could be found with the requested id

get.summary: RDF data of the whole vocabulary or a specific concept. If the vocabulary has support for it, MARCXML data is available for the whole vocabulary in each language.

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The MIME type of the serialization format, e.g "text/turtle" or "application/rdf+xml". If not specified, HTTP content negotiation (based on the Accept header) is used to determine a suitable serialization format from among the available ones.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the desired concept. When no uri parameter is given, the whole vocabulary is returned instead.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: RDF language code when the requested resource for the MIME type is language specific, e.g. "fi" or "en".

200.description: the RDF data of the requested vocabulary/concept, or MARCXML if the vocabulary supports such

404.description: no vocabulary/concept could be found with the requested id/uri

get.summary: Finds concepts and collections from a vocabulary by query term
get.description: Returns a list of search results. The search is performed as a case-insensitive pattern, where an asterisk (*) may be used as wildcard. E.g. "cat*" may return results such as "CATCH-22" and "categorization". If decoded into RDF, the result is a vocabulary fragment expressed as SKOS.

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the term to search for e.g. "cat*"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels to match, e.g. "en" or "fi"

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: limit search to concepts of the given type, e.g. "skos:Concept"; multiple types can be specified as a space-separated list

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: limit search to concepts which have the given concept (specified by URI) as parent in their transitive broader hierarchy

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: limit search to concepts in the given group (specified by URI)

parameters.name: maxhits
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. If not given, maxhits will default to 100. (default settable in config.ttl)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset where to start in ther esult set, useful for paging the result. If not given, defaults to 0.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: space-separated list of extra fields to include in the results. e.g. "related" or "prefLabel" or any other skos property.

parameters.name: unique
parameters.description: boolean flag to indicate that each concept should be returned only once, instead of returning all the different ways it could match (for example both via prefLabel and altLabel).

200.description: data of the concepts matching the search term

get.summary: Look up concepts by label
get.description: Returns the best matching concept(s) for the given label in JSON-LD format. In case the label matches several concepts with the same precedence, all of them are returned.

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: the label to look for, e.g. "cat" or "dog"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: search language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: type information about the requested vocabulary

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested label

get.summary: Number of Concepts and Collections in the vocabulary

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the concept and group counts for the vocabulary

404.description: no vocabulary could be found with the requested id

get.summary: Number of labels by language
get.description: Returns a list of label (skos:prefLabel, skos:altLabel and skos:hiddenLabel) counts in all the different languages.

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: language of labels, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the concept and group counts for the vocabulary

404.description: no vocabulary could be found with the requested id

get.summary: Preferred label for the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose label to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: search language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: preferred label for the requested concept

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Broader concepts of the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose broader concept to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the broader concept(s) of the requested concept or an empty array if there are none

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Broader transitive hierarchy for the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose broader transitive hierarchy to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the broader transitive hierarchy for the requested concept or an empty array if there concept does not have broaders

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Narrower concepts of the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose narrower concept to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the narrower concept(s) of the requested concept or an empty array if there are none

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Narrower transitive hierarchy for the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose narrower transitive hierarchy to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the narrower transitive hierarchy for the requested concept or an empty array if there concept does not have narrowers

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Related concepts of the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose related concept to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: the related concept(s) of the requested concept or an empty array if there are none

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Narrower concepts of the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose narrower concepts to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: Returns the children of the requested concept. The data is intended to be used in a hierarchical display.

404.description: no concept could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Concept groups in the vocabulary

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: concept groups of the vocabulary

404.description: no vocabulary could be found with the requested id

get.summary: Members of the requested concept group

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: concept groups of the vocabulary

404.description: no concept group could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Hierarchical context of the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose hierarchical context to return

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: Returns the hierarchical context of the requested concept. The hierarchy is intended to be used in a hierarchical display.

404.description: no concept group could be found with the requested URI

get.summary: Mappings associated with the requested concept

parameters.name: vocid
parameters.description: a Skosmos vocabulary identifier e.g. "stw" or "yso"

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the concept whose hierarchical context to return
Indicates whether mappings to external vocabularies should be listed

parameters.name: clang
parameters.description: content language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: label language, e.g. "en" or "fi"

200.description: Returns the mappings associated with the requested concept. The result is a JSKOS-compatible JSON object

304.description: the resource was not modified, so there is no need to retransmit the requested resources

404.description: no concept mappings could be found with the requested URI

superclass.description: URI of the superclass type, which this type is an extension/specialization of

hasChildren.description: Boolean value indicating whether the concept has narrower concepts

literal.description: language name e.g. "Finnish" or "English" (if lang parameter was used)

labels.description: number of labels with the specified property in the given language

hasChildren.description: Indicates whether the concept has children of its' own (narrower concepts)

hasMembers.description: Indicates whether the group has members

isSuper.description: Indicates whether the group is a superGroup to an another group

hasMembers.description: Indicates whether the group has members

hasChildren.description: Indicates whether the concept has narrower concepts

top.description: This field is present if the current concept is a toplevel concept in the vocabulary and contains the concept scheme URI

hasChildren.description: Indicates whether the concept has children of its' own (narrower concepts)
